formula: The sequence a(n-3) (for n>=3) appears to have the g.f. 1/G(0) where G(k) = 1 - q/(1 - q - q^2 - q^3 / G(k+1) ). - _Joerg Arndt_, Dec 06 2014Conjecture: n*a(n) +2*(-2*n+3)*a(n-1) +2*(n-3)*a(n-2) +(2*n-9)*a(n-3) +(n-6)*a(n-4) +(2*n-15)*a(n-5) +(n-9)*a(n-6)=0. - _R. J. Mathar_, May 01 2015
maple: A023425 := proc(n)    option remember;    if n = 0 then        1;    else        procname(n-1)+add(procname(k)*procname(n-k),k=1..n-4) ;    end if;end proc: # _R. J. Mathar_, May 01 2015
mathematica: a[ 0 ]=1; a[ n_Integer ] := a[ n ]=a[ n-1 ]+Sum[ a[ k ]*a[ n-k ], {k, 1, n-4} ];
author: _Olivier GÃ©rard_
